name: Happy Hour (itch) (DarxDev)
description:
Controls
------------
Esc - Pause menu
Left Click - Interact

Gameplay
--------------
This game is made to be replayed and failed multiple times until you discover the correct path to win, the frustration is part of it.

Move by selecting a tile, all possible interaction will be shown with an icon.
There are many paths to beat the game and there's also a secret ending.

It fits the theme of "everything has a price" as every action in the game costs drunk time.
